languages.text: Экипаж работает до кровавого пота, чтобы похвалиться в святилище исповедей праведным трудом и не схлопотать наказание за ложь.
Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.
languages.original_text: Экипаж работает до кровавого пота, чтобы похвалиться в святилище исповедей праведным трудом и не схлопотать наказание за ложь.

languages.text: Die Crew scheut weder Blut noch Schweiß bei ihrer verblüffenden Arbeit, um am Beichtschrein später im sicheren Wissen, dass Lügen bestraft werden, von ihren rechtschaffenen Taten zu berichten.
languages.original_text: Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew scheut weder Blut noch Schweiß bei ihrer verblüffenden Arbeit, um am Beichtschrein später im sicheren Wissen, dass Lügen bestraft werden, von ihren rechtschaffenen Taten zu berichten.

languages.text: Suant sang et eau, l'équipage sert avec une rigueur remarquable dans le seul but de pouvoir s'en vanter auprès du confessionnal du sanctuaire, conscient que le moindre mensonge sera sévèrement châtié.
languages.original_text: Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.

traits.locale_text: Suant sang et eau, l'équipage sert avec une rigueur remarquable dans le seul but de pouvoir s'en vanter auprès du confessionnal du sanctuaire, conscient que le moindre mensonge sera sévèrement châtié.

languages.text: Sin reparar en esfuerzos, la tripulación sirve con un rigor sobrenatural para poder contarle al altar confesonario sus tribulaciones, sabiendo que cualquier mentira recibirá su castigo.
languages.original_text: Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.

traits.locale_text: Sin reparar en esfuerzos, la tripulación sirve con un rigor sobrenatural para poder contarle al altar confesonario sus tribulaciones, sabiendo que cualquier mentira recibirá su castigo.

languages.text: 血も汗も惜しまぬクルーたちは、後からに自分たちが正義のために働いたのだと話すために、嘘には罰が下ることを知りつつも、異常なまでの激しさで役目を果たす。
languages.original_text: Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.

traits.locale_text: 血も汗も惜しまぬクルーたちは、後からに自分たちが正義のために働いたのだと話すために、嘘には罰が下ることを知りつつも、異常なまでの激しさで役目を果たす。

languages.text: 船员们毫不吝啬地挥洒着汗水与鲜血，以难以置信的严谨态度服务。这样一来，当他们下班之后在祭坛前祈祷时，就可以宣扬他们正义的劳作。所有人都知道说谎者会受到惩罚。
languages.original_text: Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.

traits.locale_text: 船员们毫不吝啬地挥洒着汗水与鲜血，以难以置信的严谨态度服务。这样一来，当他们下班之后在祭坛前祈祷时，就可以宣扬他们正义的劳作。所有人都知道说谎者会受到惩罚。

languages.text: Yalanlarının ceza almalarına neden olacağını bilen mürettebat, kan ve ter akıtmaktan çekinmiyor ve gösterdikleri emeği daha sonra mabet günah çıkarma biriminde anlatabilmek adına olağanüstü bir azimle hizmet ediyor.
languages.original_text: Sparing no sweat or blood, the crew serves with uncanny rigour just so they might tell about their righteous toils at the shrine confessional later, knowing that lies will be met with punishment.
